subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds sent a 97-mile-an-hour fastball from reliever Scott Linebrink onto the roof of a concession stand behind the center-field fence, an estimated 440 feet from the plate, for his 712th career homer.
snippet: Barry Bonds sent a 97-mile-an-hour fastball from reliever Scott Linebrink onto the roof of a concession stand behind the center-field fence, an estimated 440 feet from the plate, for his 712th career homer.
